original_text: It was Christ who chose to give different gifts to his people. He chose some to be apostles. He chose some to speak messages from God. He chose some to tell God's good news to many people. He chose some to take care of his people, and to teach them.
korean_text: 그가 어떤 사람은 사도로, 어떤 사람은 선지자로, 어떤 사람은 복음 전하는 자로, 어떤 사람은 목사와 교사로 삼으셨으니

sentences.original_text: to give different gifts to his people
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 백성들에게 다른 은사를 주시기 위해

sentences.original_text: He chose some to be apostles
He chose some to speak messages from God
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 어떤 이들을 하나님의 메시지를 전파하도록 선택하셨다

sentences.original_text: He chose some to tell God's good news
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 어떤 이들을 하나님의 복음을 전파하도록 선택하셨다

sentences.original_text: He chose some to take care of his people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 어떤 이들을 그의 백성을 돌보도록 선택하셨다
